","workspace_file_chunks":[]},{"status":"success","request_id":"38a8e67d-6cd0-49e0-ab10-0849d5ab9ffb","request_message":"","structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":5,"content":"","tool_use":{"tool_use_id":"toolu_01QuCzxK1GVpuwPo6sYrZWJp","tool_name":"view","input_json":"{"path": "docs", "type": "directory"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Maintenant, examinons le dossier docs pour avoir plus d'informations : "},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Here's the result of running `cat -n` on README.md: 1 # ClimInvest - Climate Micro-Insurance via SMS 2 3
4 5 6 ## Revolutionizing Agricultural Insurance in West Africa 7
8 9 [![OpenEPI Hackathon 2025](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenEPI-Hackathon%202025-blue)](https://developer.openepi.io/hackathon-2025) 10 [![SDG](https://img.shields.io/badge/SDG-2%20Zero%20Hunger-green)](https://sdgs.un.org/goals/goal2) 11 [![React Native](https://img.shields.io/badge/React%20Native-0.72-blue)](https://reactnative.dev/) 12 [![OpenEPI](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenEPI-Integrated-green)](https://openepi.io/) 13 14 ## Project Overview 15 16 ClimInvest is a revolutionary mobile application that democratizes access to agricultural insurance in West Africa. Using a mobile-first approach with SMS integration and phone calls, the application offers climate micro-insurance accessible to all farmers, even those without smartphones. 17 18 ## Video Demonstration 19 20 ### Video 1 - Application Overview 21 22 [Voir Video 1](https://res.cloudinary.com/dtwx8br7o/video/upload/v1754236059/Video1_gpawi3.mp4) 23 24 --- 25 26 ### Video 2 - Detailed Features 27 28 [Voir Video 2](https://res.cloudinary.com/dtwx8br7o/video/upload/v1754236085/Video2_k8nf5s.mp4) 29 30 > **Discover ClimInvest in action**: SMS subscription, automatic payout triggers, Analytics tab with credit scoring, and all accessibility features. 31 32 *[Click on the video links to see the complete application demonstration]* 33 34 ### Problem Addressed 35 36 - **97% of African farmers uninsured** vs 50% in Asia 37 - **0.7% of global insurance premiums** for 17% of arable land 38 - **Compensation delays: 3-6 months** with traditional insurance 39 - **Access barriers**: prohibitive costs, administrative complexity, low banking penetration 40 41 ### Innovative Solution 42 43 **100% mobile** micro-insurance using: 44 - **Call to 980** - Advisors guiding the complete process 45 - **SMS "MON ASSURANCE AGRICOLE" to 980** - Simple SMS subscription 46 - **Advanced OpenEPI APIs** - Real-time climate, soil, yield data 47 - **Mobile Money** - MTN MoMo, Orange Money, Flooz 48 - **Voice interface** - Local languages (fon, yoruba, bambara) 49 - **Community** - One user can help their entire farming community 50 51 ## Accessibility Features 52 53 ### Multiple Access Options 54 55 1. **Mobile Application** (Android/iOS) 56 - Complete interface with all features 57 - Screen reader support 58 - Voice navigation in local languages 59 - Full OpenEPI APIs integration 60 61 2. **Phone Access (980)** 62 - **For users without Android smartphones** 63 - Advisors guiding the subscription process 64 - Same process for loan applications 65 - Multilingual support 66 - Access to same OpenEPI data via advisors 67 68 3. **Simple SMS to 980** 69 - Send **"MON ASSURANCE AGRICOLE"** to 980 70 - SMS-guided process 71 - SMS confirmation and follow-up 72 - Accessible on all phones 73 74 4. **Community System** 75 - A farmer with the app can help their community 76 - Facilitated collective registration 77 - Sharing of OpenEPI climate information 78 79 ### Data Transparency 80 81 The **Analytics** tab provides advanced services based on user feedback: 82 - **Agricultural credit score** based on OpenEPI data (soil, climate, yields) 83 - **Access to financing** with eligible amounts and personalized rates 84 - **Agricultural analysis**: soil quality, historical yields, market prices 85 - **Personalized advice** to optimize production and sales 86 87 ## OpenEPI Integration - System Core 88 89 ### OpenEPI APIs Used 90 91 1. **Climate Data API** 92 - Historical and real-time meteorological data 93 - Drought and precipitation indices 94 - Automatic payout triggers 95 96 2. **Soil Quality API** 97 - Soil quality analysis 98 - Personalized agricultural recommendations 99 - Credit scoring based on soil quality 100 101 3. **Crop Health Monitoring** 102 - Satellite crop surveillance 103 - Early detection of water stress 104 - Proactive alerts to farmers 105 106 4. **Flood Detection API** 107 - Real-time flood detection 108 - Mapping of affected areas 109 - Automatic compensation triggers 110 111 ### Benefits of OpenEPI Integration 112 113 - **Reliable and updated data** in real-time 114 - **Complete geographical coverage** of West Africa 115 - **Advanced detection algorithms** for climate events 116 - **Seamless integration** with mobile payment systems 117 - **Cost reduction** through automation 118 119 ## Competitive Advantages vs Traditional Insurance 120 121 | **Criteria** | **ClimInvest** | **Traditional Insurance** | 122 |-------------|-----------------|-------------------------| 123 | **Monthly cost** | 200-1,000 FCFA | 5,000-20,000 FCFA | 124 | **Payout delay** | 24-72h automatic | 3-6 months (expertise) | 125 | **Accessibility** | Mobile money + illiterate | Office + bank account | 126 | **Geographic coverage** | Remote areas via satellite | Urban centers only | 127 | **Prerequisites** | Basic phone | Smartphone + internet | 128 129 ## Proven Technological Foundations 130 131 Satellite data is accessible via Digital Earth Africa, which provides historical images since 1984 covering the entire African continent. The NDVI system can detect crop stress up to **2 weeks before visual detection**, while Sentinel-1 offers **>95% accuracy for flood detection**. 132 133 AGRHYMET infrastructures guarantee access to real-time meteorological data for the 15 ECOWAS countries, with automated weather stations and Next Generation seasonal forecasting models. 134 135 ## Sustainable Economic Model 136 137 - **80%** of premiums → Compensation fund 138 - **15%** → Technical costs (data, SMS, platform) 139 - **5%** → Growth and reserves 140 141 **Break-even point**: 50,000 insured with a government reserve fund of 10% of premiums for major disasters. 142 143 ## International Lessons 144 145 **Kenya (Kilimo Salama)**: Launched in 2009 with 200 farmers, the program reached 51,000 insured in Kenya and 14,000 in Rwanda. Premium revenues increased from 19 million KSh in 2011 to 33 million KSh in 6 months in 2012. 146 147 **India (PMFBY)**: The government program covers 194 million farmers with 50% premium subsidies. Premiums range from 1.5% to 5% of insured amounts depending on crops. 148 149 These successes demonstrate the viability of index insurance at scale with appropriate public support. 150 151 ## Projected Impact 152 153 - **500,000 farmers** protected by 2027 154 - **2.5 million people** secured (families included) 155 - **45x faster compensation** (24-72h vs 3-6 months) 156 - **10x lower cost** than traditional insurance 157 - **Extended geographic coverage** thanks to OpenEPI data 158 159 ## SDG Contribution 160 161 - **SDG 2**: Zero Hunger - Food security 162 - **SDG 1**: Rural poverty reduction 163 - **SDG 13**: Climate action - Shock resilience 164 - **SDG 10**: Reduced inequalities - Democratized access 165 166 ## Installation and Setup 167 168 ### Prerequisites 169 170 ```bash 171 Node.js >= 18 172 npm or yarn 173 Expo CLI 174 Android Studio (for Android emulation) 175 Xcode (for iOS emulation, macOS only) 176 OpenEPI API keys (required) 177 ``` 178 179 ### Installation 180 181 ```bash 182 # Clone the repository 183 git clone https://github.com/your-username/clim-invest 184 cd clim-invest 185 186 # Install dependencies 187 npm install 188 189 # Configure OpenEPI keys in .env 190 cp .env.example .env 191 # Add your OpenEPI keys 192 193 # Start development server 194 npm start 195 196 # Run on Android 197 npm run android 198 199 # Run on iOS 200 npm run ios 201 ``` 202 203 ### OpenEPI Configuration 204 205 ```bash 206 # Required environment variables 207 OPENEPI_API_KEY=your_api_key_here 208 OPENEPI_BASE_URL=https://api.openepi.io/v1 209 OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id 210 OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET=your_client_secret 211 ``` 212 213 ## Project Structure 214 215 ``` 216 ClimInvest/ 217 ├── src/ 218 │ ├── components/ # Reusable components 219 │ │ ├── common/ # Accessible components 220 │ │ ├── cards/ # Information cards 221 │ │ └── dashboard/ # Dashboard components 222 │ ├── screens/ # Main screens 223 │ ├── navigation/ # Navigation configuration 224 │ ├── services/ # OpenEPI APIs and other services 225 │ │ ├── openEpiService.ts # Main OpenEPI service 226 │ │ ├── hybridOpenEpiService.ts # Hybrid service with fallback 227 │ │ └── creditScoringService.ts # OpenEPI-based scoring 228 │ ├── store/ # Redux store and slices 229 │ ├── types/ # TypeScript types 230 │ ├── utils/ # Utilities 231 │ └── hooks/ # Custom hooks 232 ├── docs/ # Technical documentation 233 └── assets/ # Static resources 234 ``` 235 236 ## Complete Documentation 237 238 - [Technical Architecture](docs/TECHNICAL_ARCHITECTURE.md) 239 - [OpenEPI Integration](docs/DATA_SOURCES.md) 240 - [API Documentation](docs/API_DOCUMENTATION.md) 241 - [Business Model](docs/BUSINESS_MODEL.md) 242 - [Impact Metrics](docs/IMPACT_METRICS.md) 243 - [Deployment Guide](docs/DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md) 244 - [User Feedback](docs/USER_FEEDBACK.md) 245 246 ## Testing and Quality 247 248 ```bash 249 # Run tests 250 npm test 251 252 # Tests with coverage 253 npm run test:coverage 254 255 # OpenEPI integration tests 256 npm run test:openepi 257 258 # Linting 259 npm run lint 260 ``` 261 262 ## Contact and Support 263 264 ### For Farmers 265 - **Phone**: 980 (free) 266 - **SMS**: Send "MON ASSURANCE AGRICOLE" to 980 267 - **Application**: Download from Google Play Store 268 269 ### For Developers 270 - **ClimInvest Team** - contact@climinvest.org 271 - **OpenEPI Documentation** - [https://developer.openepi.io](https://developer.openepi.io) 272 - **Repository** - [https://github.com/climinvest/mobile-app](https://github.com/climinvest/mobile-app) 273 274 ## License 275 276 This project is under MIT license. See the `LICENSE` file for more details. 277 278 --- 279 280 *Developed for OpenEPI Hackathon 2025 - Revolutionizing African agriculture through climate data* 281 Total lines in file: 281 Maintenant j'ai une vue d'ensemble. Je vais créer un plan détaillé pour transformer cette landing page ORION en ClimInvest. ## Plan détaillé pour la transformation ORION → ClimInvest Basé sur l'analyse du README.md et des fichiers existants, voici le plan de transformation : ### Fichiers à modifier : 1. **index.html** - Page principale - Titre de la page - Contenu du hero section - Descriptions de l'application - FAQ - Section de téléchargement - Footer avec informations de contact 2. **about.html** - Page à propos 3. **contact.html** - Page de contact 4. **pricing.html** - Page de tarification 5. **features-1.html** - Page des fonctionnalités 6. **Assets/images/** - Logos et images 7. **Autres pages HTML** si nécessaire ### Informations ClimInvest à intégrer : **Concept principal :** Application de micro-assurance climatique via SMS pour l'Afrique de l'Ouest **Fonctionnalités clés :** - Assurance agricole accessible par SMS (980) - Intégration OpenEPI pour données climatiques - Paiements automatiques en 24-72h - Support multilingue (fon, yoruba, bambara) - Mobile Money (MTN MoMo, Orange Money, Flooz) **Contact :** - Téléphone : 980 (gratuit) - SMS : "MON ASSURANCE AGRICOLE" à 980 - Email : contact@climinvest.org Voulez-vous que je commence par modifier le fichier index.html avec ces informations ClimInvest ? Using a mobile-first approach with SMS integration and phone calls, the application offers climate micro-insurance accessible to all farmers, even those without smartphones. 17 18 ## Video Demonstration ... 180 181 ```bash 182 # Clone the repository 183 git clone https://github.com/your-username/clim-invest 184 cd clim-invest 185 186 # Install dependencies 187 npm install 188 189 # Configure OpenEPI keys in .env 190 cp .env.example .env 191 # Add your OpenEPI keys 192 193 # Start development server 194 npm start 195 196 # Run on Android 197 npm run android 198 199 # Run on iOS 200 npm run ios 201 ``` 202 203 ### OpenEPI Configuration 204 205 ```bash 206 # Required environment variables 207 OPENEPI_API_KEY=your_api_key_here 208 OPENEPI_BASE_URL=https://api.openepi.io/v1 209 OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id 210 OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET=your_client_secret 211 ``` 212 213 ## Project Structure 214 215 ``` 216 ClimInvest/ 217 ├── src/ 218 │ ├── components/ # Reusable components 219 │ │ ├── common/ # Accessible components 220 │ │ ├── cards/ # Information cards 221 │ │ └── dashboard/ # Dashboard components 222 │ ├── screens/ # Main screens 223 │ ├── navigation/ # Navigation configuration 224 │ ├── services/ # OpenEPI APIs and other services 225 │ │ ├── openEpiService.ts # Main OpenEPI service 226 │ │ ├── hybridOpenEpiService.ts # Hybrid service with fallback 227 │ │ └── creditScoringService.ts # OpenEPI-based scoring 228 │ ├── store/ # Redux store and slices 229 │ ├── types/ # TypeScript types 230 │ ├── utils/ # Utilities 231 │ └── hooks/ # Custom hooks 232 ├── docs/ # Technical documentation 233 └── assets/ # Static resources 234 ``` 235 236 ## Complete Documentation 237 238 - [Impact Metrics](docs/IMPACT_METRICS.md) 243 - [Deployment Guide](docs/DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md) 244 - [User Feedback](docs/USER_FEEDBACK.md) 245 246 ## Testing and Quality 247 248 ```bash 249 # Run tests 250 npm test 251 252 # Tests with coverage 253 npm run test:coverage 254 255 # OpenEPI integration tests 256 npm run test:openepi 257 258 # Linting 259 npm run lint 260 ``` 261 262 ## Contact and Support 263 264 ### For Farmers 265 - Path: docs/IMPACT_METRICS.md 1 # Impact Metrics - ClimInvest 2 3 ## Sustainable Development Goals Overview 4 5 ClimInvest directly contributes to several United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), with quantifiable metrics based on OpenEPI data and actual application usage. 6 7 ## SDG 2 - Zero Hunger (Primary Objective) 8 9 ### Key Metrics ... 333 334 sdg13_climateAction: { 335 score: this.calculateSDG13Score(), 336 trend: 'Résilience +35% face changement climatique', 337 keyAchievements: [ 338 '2M alertes climatiques délivrées', 339 '35% réduction risque climatique', 340 '20M points données collectées' 341 ] 342 }, 343 344 overallImpactScore: this.calculateOverallImpact(), 345 346 projections2030: { 347 farmersReached: 1200000, 348 economicImpact: '240 Mds FCFA', 349 climateResilience: '+55%', 350 povertyReduction: '720,000 ménages' 351 } 352 }; 353 } 354 } 355 ``` 356 357 Ces métriques d'impact démontrent la contribution significative de ClimInvest aux Objectifs de Développement Durable, avec des mesures quantifiables basées sur les données OpenEPI et l'utilisation réelle de l'application par les agriculteurs d'Afrique de l'Ouest. ... Path: docs/USER_FEEDBACK.md 1 # User Feedback and Improvements - ClimInvest 2 3 ## Real User Feedback and Adaptations 4 5 ### 1. Concern About Fund Transparency 6 7 **User Feedback:** 8 > "For 3 years, I pay my premiums but there has been no disaster. Where does my money go? Do you keep it for yourselves?" 9 > - *Corn farmer, Parakou region* 10 11 **Application Response:** 12 - **Creation of "Analytics" tab** to show added value beyond insurance 13 - **Agricultural credit score** based on OpenEPI data (soil, yields, climate) 14 - **Access to financing**: eligible amount, interest rate, repayment duration 15 - **Advanced agricultural analysis**: soil quality, historical yields, market prices 16 - **Personalized advice** to optimize production and sales ... Maintenant j'ai une vue d'ensemble. Je vais créer un plan détaillé pour transformer cette landing page ORION en ClimInvest. ## Plan détaillé pour la transformation ORION → ClimInvest Basé sur l'analyse du README.md et des fichiers existants, voici le plan de transformation : ### Fichiers à modifier : 1. **index.html** - Page principale - Titre de la page - Contenu du hero section - Descriptions de l'application - FAQ - Section de téléchargement - Footer avec informations de contact 2. **about.html** - Page à propos 3. **contact.html** - Page de contact 4. **pricing.html** - Page de tarification 5. **features-1.html** - Page des fonctionnalités 6. **Assets/images/** - Logos et images 7. **Autres pages HTML** si nécessaire ### Informations ClimInvest à intégrer : **Concept principal :** Application de micro-assurance climatique via SMS pour l'Afrique de l'Ouest **Fonctionnalités clés :** - Assurance agricole accessible par SMS (980) - Intégration OpenEPI pour données climatiques - Paiements automatiques en 24-72h - Support multilingue (fon, yoruba, bambara) - Mobile Money (MTN MoMo, Orange Money, Flooz) **Contact :** - Téléphone : 980 (gratuit) - SMS : "MON ASSURANCE AGRICOLE" à 980 - Email : contact@climinvest.org Voulez-vous que je commence par modifier le fichier index.html avec ces informations ClimInvest ?
